text: Special camps to receive applications for inclusion of eligible persons, deletions, and corrections in the electoral rolls will be held at all polling stations in the district on January 31 and February 6, according to an official release. All those who have attained the age of 18 as on January 1, 2016 can apply for inclusions. Applications can be filed through the websitewww.elections.tn.gov.in
title: Special camp for voters’ list
